name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lingocloud: Web Translation, Video Translation, AI Reading Assistant

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI translation extension for everyone, providing the ultimate bilingual webpage translation experience. The best AI translation tool

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This update addresses reported issues and further optimizes performance and features to ensure a smoother experience. Thank you for your support!

Travel the world in your native language with Lingocloud AI, effortlessly rebuilding the Tower of Babel, ğŸŒâœ¨ breaking language barriers, and opening the door to a new world! Whether you're a beginner or a language expert, Lingocloud AI provides you with the ultimate foreign language reading experience. Powered by the Lingocloud AI translation model, combining bilingual web page translation, word-by-word translation, AI reading assistant, and a comprehensive glossary library, you can read academic journals, novels, or news in your native language without barriers.

If you feel your foreign language skills are limited, Lingocloud AI helps you break through language walls; if you're proficient, Lingocloud AI speeds up your reading, allowing you to gather more foreign content in the same amount of time. ğŸ“ğŸ“– Lingocloud AI is the perfect AI tool for reading, learning, research, and travel.

Features:

1. Bilingual Web Page Translation: ğŸŒ When browsing a website, simply click the "Lingocloud icon," and the page will switch to a "bilingual mode." Whether you're a beginner or an expert, you'll easily navigate vast foreign web content.

2. Word-by-Word Translation: ğŸ–±ï¸ While browsing foreign websites, select any text, and you'll get an instant translation. Foreign content is now at your fingertips.

3. Video Translation: ğŸ¥ While watching web videos, click the "Video Translation Button" to generate real-time bilingual subtitles. Learn as you watch and easily enjoy foreign-language videos.

4. AI Reading Assistant: ğŸ¤– Lingocloud AI offers conversational Q&A, helping you quickly grasp complex foreign content, making global exploration easier.

5. Glossary: ğŸ“š Lingocloud AI includes a built-in glossary library of 100,000+ specialized terms, and supports custom libraries, ensuring accurate translation of professional terminology and personalized expressions.

6. PDF Translation: ğŸ“„ Automatically detects PDF file links, offering one-click translation while retaining the document's original format for easy foreign PDF reading.

Explore a bigger world with Lingocloud AI !  ğŸŒŸ

Notes:

Permissions: ğŸ”’ To properly use word-by-word translation, automatic translation, and video translation features, please allow Lingocloud translate to read and modify data on the websites you visit. Video translation requires sharing the current tab's audio when activated.

Feedback: ğŸ’Œ If you have any questions, suggestions, or feedback, feel free to visit our feedback page to share your thoughts with us! Visit https://support.qq.com/products/107129/
